title: Font with Abruzzi connection
content: I'm looking for a font/font family with an Abruzzi, Italy connection. I'm designing a cookbook which has strong links to the area, and would like to have the typography linked as well. All input appreciated!
author: seraph

comments.content:
c'mon Coles...identify 1, I passed Miriam into the forum.   
   
he could be sleeping again.
